Description: Polentical Neon is a post modern / square font style.

Update Log:

Version 1.2 - 5/5/2013
- Modified from square to sharp
- Fixed in bold 'L' correctly

Version 1.1 - 4/21/2013
- Added in Bold and Bold Italic Styles
- Fixed in metrics from 200 to 100
